name: Sprouts Discord Bot
description: Enterprise-grade Discord bot with ticket system, transcript generation, and comprehensive server management

scripts.postdeploy: echo 'SPROUTS Bot deployed successfully on Digital Ocean'

DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN.description: Discord bot token from Discord Developer Portal

DATABASE_URL.description: PostgreSQL connection string for ticket system and data storage

MONGO_URI.description: MongoDB connection string for backup data storage
